website_summaries.verdict: Its durable material, realistic feel, and reputation for reliability makes this bag the best one on the market.
pros: Generous body length and high-quality construction withstands heavy prolonged use
Skin doesn't have the horrible rubber smell and is even soft enough to punch barehanded
cons: On the pricier side, but well worth the extra investment if you are serious about your training

customer_reviews.title: Century Bob changed my LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: Watching what u eat is great for long term weigh loss. But if u want fast results. Try 30 minutes a day with Century Bob. This thing is freakin awesome. Easy to move and soft to the touch. Easy setup and great stress reliever. I've lost 45 pounds in 4 months. I feel great. This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using heavy bags for many years but decided to try a "BOB" for a more realistic workout. Overall it's excellent. I have it filled with water and it does rock a lot and move around on the floor. But that's fine because opponents also move when hit. I don't use any gloves or hand wraps but Bob is well padded and much easier on my hands than my old canvas and leather bags. I highly recommend Bob XL for a great punching and striking workout. Just remember, it's not like a real fight. Bob doesn't punch back...
customer_reviews.author: U2

customer_reviews.title: Better than a gym membership
customer_reviews.text: Our gym had a heavy bag in a hallway corner (who made this decision?), so we got BOB XL instead of renewing our membership. It's been over a year of one-hour-3-days-a-week use and Bob is still going strong. He takes hits that sometimes take him down, but although he's turned grey from wear, he hasn't busted yet. When he does, we'll just get out the duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Thus is an overall good product and have it delivered to your house is awesome. Think on filling the base with sand as it moves too much if you use water. One down thing is that it cannot stand judo entries. I put a gi on it and it feels good to practice, but puling the sleeves put a lot of torque on the rubber part that is only attached to the axis with few screws. Youll rip them off with regular practice. That was a big disappointment because being able to do entries would be a big extra to the intended use
customer_reviews.author: AGV

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Technical Striking
customer_reviews.text: I bought BOB from Amazon seller KJ Sports and it is great. Super fast service and delivery. Put the torso on the base and ready to go. I used water for weight and for boxing and body kicks BOB rocks but doesn't tip over. I do have to pull BOB back to center after each round since the unit does inch backward with each straight power punch and rotates slightly with each hook. Any floor based unit will have this action but only BOB simulates a real human target. Jab, cross, hooks head and body, uppercuts chin and body, overhand right to head and shovel hook to jaw, neck or ribs are all realistic. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Bob XL, a big yes from me
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. I put off buying one for a long time. I used to fight Muay Thai, and thought all I needed was a banana bag, tear drop, maybe a tire.. no, this Bob XL is pretty legit. I love it. The xl is much worth the extra price, you wanna kick him in the legs. Cause, if he gets away, he'll haunt your nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: AG.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product and once base is loaded, it is very sturdy. I haven’t used it much yet...travels...but I have tried it out. Get gloves, you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Blackstar5

customer_reviews.title: Waited forever for a sale price
customer_reviews.text: I like the realism that this training dummy provides. It allows people of all ages who may have never actually hit someone, to feel whats its like to strike something human sized and somewhat lifelike. I like the adjustable height. Will be starting my kids on this early.
customer_reviews.author: Longdriver19

customer_reviews.title: ... you are into mixed martial arts there is no better bag than the BOB
customer_reviews.text: If you are into mixed martial arts there is no better bag than the BOB. Although you cannot kick him in the back, there is plenty you can do up front and on the sides. I recommend paying extra for the XL (basically the pelvic region) - even though kicking/striking there might not be practical in a match, its just more surface to hit for practice/exercise. I would give 5 stars except, as with most of these, filling with sand makes drainage tedious, and filling with water leaves enough room for slight movement when you get into a strong body-shot rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Loving bob
customer_reviews.text: Omg I’ve been wanting this for years and I finally got it I love it can’t wait to beat bob up. 🤣😂🤣😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: ThyckGirlCurvze

customer_reviews.title: I filled mine up with water. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOVE this! This item was CRUCIAL to let the stress out after work especially as a healthcare worker working during the pandemic! The “man” moves back ever so slightly at a time when I throw fairly hard punches but I don’t mind pushing him back to the correct position *from the base* because then I get an extra leg workout. I don’t know if he’s more stable with sand but I don’t want to add sand in it at this time because I’m constantly moving him while I’m working out.
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny! Can take a beating! Love how his height is adjustable and haven’t had an issue with it sliding down while at maximum height. I do suggest 150lbs of sand instead of 100, it moved to much with 100lbs and foam flooring under.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: great for sparring...  but use the heavy bag for full contact
customer_reviews.text: good for boxing or kali sticks (use padded rattan if you want the dummy to last)... I like that the height/weight is adjustable... so I can spar with multiple height "opponents" and weight it down enough that if I go "full-contact" it doesn't go flying across my garage (I have about 150# of sand in the base and it still wobbles but it doesn't go flying unless I really unload it). I think I still prefer my heavy bag for full-force conditioning, but this is much better for sparring. Like combining your shadow boxing routine with a medium weight bag routine.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Seems a very good product so far
customer_reviews.text: The mouth of the base is a little too small to get sand in; should have made the hole wider with a bigger cap. The sand clogged too readily going in and I imagined trying to get the sand out one day would be nearly impossible. I ended up giving up pretty quickly and just used water. The base is adequate but it would have been a little sturdier with the extra weight of the sand. As far as use itself, it's been great! I can imagine it holding up to years of striking and kicking. He's still a bit scary to my girlfriend each time she forgets he's lurking on the patio and she glimpses him through the window.
customer_reviews.author: David Leiting

customer_reviews.title: There are two deliveries for this product. One may come the next day(s).
customer_reviews.text: I got Bob for my husband as a Father's Day gift and it said I was to deliver three days after Father's day. I was a little upset, but I knew he would've appreciated it. Fortunately, thank God it came in the day before Father's day and my husband was so eager to find out what it was lol. Hence there are two separate deliveries one for the body and the other was the stand. Over all he was very satisfied and happy with the product. It's a must buy, every guy should have one even ladies. 💪✨
customer_reviews.author: Tago

customer_reviews.title: Great as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. I have cut down on weights with age and have implemented a more cross training workout and this is the perfect compliment to my everyday exercises. Its sturdy, strong and feels real. Love that its easy to out together and has adjustable height settings. I’d but it again if I had to!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Is really easy to remove the body from the stand and very ...
customer_reviews.text: This punching bag is a tank; believe me you will never break it. Is really easy to remove the body from the stand and very easy to clean. I had a problem with the shipment due to the hurricane that crossed Florida. This seller took a step forward and was kind and generous with me. I had to wait a little but at last I have my BOB and I'm already practicing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: El Cartujano

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful for our family.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the whole family. To Practice self defense. Our neighborhood is getting a little crazy. Drugys and bums wanting to start a fight when you're setting on your own front porch when you're minding your own business. That's crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry NAFC

customer_reviews.title: Very Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these years ago at a boxing gym I went to and I enjoyed using it. I like it better than a plain old heavy bag because it's a better representation of hitting a human target. So now that I have one of my own...watch out BOB.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: even flexible weapons Bob doesn't mind and provides a great workout. Even my wife loves Bob
customer_reviews.text: Bob has become part of the family. Edged(practice), impact, even flexible weapons Bob doesn't mind and provides a great workout. Even my wife loves Bob. Your hands will need gloves, though, Bob is really tough. Great product & KJ sports was great, too. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Exit 42

customer_reviews.title: You won't find a better standing bag
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Some people have complained about this bag sliding around. I think this might be because they fill it up with water. I read a trick for filling these up on another similar item. Fill it up with sand using a funnel, and wash the sand in as it goes. Once it gets full, tip it over and pour all the water out, and keep doing this until you've reached your desired weight. I've spent about 20 minutes on it so far and it has barely moved an inch. I'm a 220 lb 6'4" man. You won't find a better standing bag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the BoB XL and it meets all of my expectations for a training tool. I'm a 3rd degree blk belt in Shorinjiryu Karate, I recently renovated my training studio, and invested in the BoB XL in lieu of having a heavy bag. I filled the base with 250lbs of play sand from Home Depot and commenced training. Regardless of your experience or level of intensity in training, a tool like the BoB XL will fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular size torso Bob
customer_reviews.text: My husband used to have a regular sized torso Bob that he had worn out and I knew he was wanting a new one. I went ahead and got the XL Bob for my husband for Christmas. He loves it even more than he loved his old torso Bob. I'm just glad he beats his torso Bob instead of me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: We love Bob!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG we love Bob!!! Although he has scared the crap out of all of us in the home even though we know he is there! LOL! Great workout buddy! Great for intense or casual workouts and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality training gear.
customer_reviews.text: The Century Bob XL is awesome training device. It presents a more realistic profile for kicking, punching and low strikes. Hang ups on shoulders with an axe kick, targeting the temple, elbow strikes . . . all more realistic and different than a traditional heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: bbc

customer_reviews.title: What a powerful teaching tool for younger students.
customer_reviews.text: The lifelike features and the 200 pounds of weight that I put into it had made a very realistic punching experience for my younger students. I have two young teenage female black belts who will benefit greatly from the ability to focus on actual features. They will also gain punching and kicking power by actually being able to hit a lifelike bag. I expect great strides will be made in their training.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis williams

customer_reviews.title: Was feeling old, but no more.
customer_reviews.text: At my age, past 40, I was starting to feel a little tight and seemed to get slight injuries more often. Have been using Bob for about a week and feel 15 years younger. Filled with water it may move around a little, but so much better than hitting a heavy bag, in my opinion at least.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that takes a beating!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! This thing is solid and well made. I can already tell it's going to last a long time. Setup was extremely easy, as there are only two parts: the "B.O.B." and the base. Fill the base with sand or water (I recommend sand, as water tends to ebb and flow inside the base and the unit moves around more than I like), and just slide the torso on top. The height positions are a great feature, and provide a lot of variety.
customer_reviews.author: Frubbish

customer_reviews.title: Bob does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I like BOB very much and eveything is good for punching. But one problem is it will drop down after several punching, then I have to hug BOB and take it up Another thing is it moves around due to heavy punch
customer_reviews.author: John Song

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: My son is really into martial arts right now. We bought this for his 8th birthday. He goes to martial arts practice twice a week but wanted to be able to practice his skills at home as well. It was a little costly, but he uses it all the time. Heck, if I get frustrated I can even go give it a punch or kick! It's very sturdy and heavy weight. In fact it is the exact same BOB used in his martial arts class.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Case

customer_reviews.title: Bob is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment is the real deal. It is solid, and yet absorbs punches and kicks well. My wife and I practice hard and close, so at our force it is good to have a partner there to make sure that one strong front kick or hook punch won't send it tipping (it doesn't fall over), just like you would with any hanging bag, to keep the motion going. It's great to have real body targets and adjustable height to "spar" and get more challenges out of the equipment. Great communication with the company, fast shipping, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rich F

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product wasn’t stabile I filled up the tank with full of water but still it’s moving A lot on the floor it’s not worth it with this much money and wasn’t good good quality at all I send the item back to the seller a while ago and hasn’t get my refund yet .
customer_reviews.author: aykan

customer_reviews.title: Great way to mix up your cardio workout.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a regular person, not a fighter, but I love boxing and MMA and thought this looked like a fun way to mix up my cardio workout. It's really an impressive piece of equipment and I've enjoyed beating on it. If you're not a fighter I think you'd be really surprised how exhausting working out on one of these can be. Really gets me sweating and my heart rate up like you would expect from vigorous exercise. Definitely get some gloves though to hit it with. I think you would hurt your knuckles if you hit it barehanded very much. I got these gloves and have been 100% satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Hes bug and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was great, very prompt and before christmas. BOB is pretty big and is fun to smack around my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: N F

customer_reviews.title: ...and Bob's Your Uncle.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but adjustable to man size, durable and substantial. By far a better workout mate even if you choose not to hit it and use it solely for targeting when shadow boxing as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product backed with excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son from 'The Martial Arts Store' and received it in two parts, the base was sent separately. We noticed a defect on the body and approached the store about it. They were prompt on the response and sent another BOB to replace the defective one. Very pleased with their prompt response! If you have to buy BOB, buy it from 'The Martial Arts Store'. My son loves it and I use it to vent every now and then too.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: This Bob training dummy is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for training. I have mine outside and so far it stands up pretty well against the elements (except for nipping dogs lol).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Valery

customer_reviews.title: Great product but should have a bigger filling hole.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great! Not gonna lie....100% use sand instead of water for best stabilization. Im a 6’0” 220 athletic person so I needed 250Lbs of sand so make sure it wouldn’t tip. Make sure you get dry sand or it will be a nightmare to pour in.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived sooner and in excellent condition. So far i like this a lot! Well made and designed.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoBlueLake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Self Defense Classes
customer_reviews.text: We have beat up Bob more times than we can count. Definitely durable and definitely helps us get our close quarters training with fire arms together. We don’t actually shoot at Bob but we shoot at Bob.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness and stability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment to practice techniques and keep up muscle memory. Very sturdy, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Deere

customer_reviews.title: Great sparing dummy
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with BOB, the dummy works very well, it can take a really good beating. I also like the XL because it's easier to kick it. To get rid of the brand new smell just leave it outside for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Great martial arts training tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! My only complaint is that nowhere on the instructions or anywhere on the internet does it tell you how much sand to fill it with or if there is a certain kind of sand that is best. It just says fill with water or sand and that is it. Other than that it is a great martial arts training tool!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Brooks

customer_reviews.title: TKD gear
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend this product. A true value for the money and 100% functional.
customer_reviews.author: kristie l. kennington-otto

customer_reviews.title: Versatile training partner
customer_reviews.text: Been taking Krav Maga for a while now but sadly had no one at home to train with me. Bob is the closest thing to a real partner, can practice accuracy on a variety of strikes and chokes. I can even take the top off the base and practice some ground work as well. Initially I filled the base with water but feel that might be too light, switching to sand will be the way to go to create a more stable base when you’re really striking hard.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say but it is a high quality product and it was shipped FAST! Always wanted one of these Bob XL's and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 2cents

customer_reviews.title: Everything i needed
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for me! Certainly great for martial arts, but certainly for releasing stress. Want to knock someone out? Take it up with the doll. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I beat the living S%$% out of Bob and he likes it, he doesn't complain, doesn't fight back, just takes it. He is Awesome
customer_reviews.author: kiwis_n_ct

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product qas as noted but after only a month the metal pins that hold Bob to his post broke. He is barely attached now. Also, I did not put him on a rubber floor so his movement on the cement is wearing the bottom out fast. I used sand to fill in because the water was too light and he was rocking at every hit
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good product. It's made out of durable material and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It's made out of durable material and without filling the base with water or sand, it's lightweight enough so you can move it around easily. I would recommend a small change in structure to make the chest sit behind the plane of the face. Right now if you do uppercuts, your fist meets the chest first before the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beating Bob is one of my favorite things. :-)
customer_reviews.text: I've been a martial artist for 29 years, I've used a lot of different heavy bags, speed bags, kicking shields, focus pads, etc. If you're ready to stop throwing yourself at it overweighted bag repeatedly slamming your body into it and you're interested in working fluid accurate striking torso Bob is your guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes in two boxes but easy to move...empty!
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting into Muay Thai, and this XL BOB is perfect as he has thighs to take high leg kicks. He is the perfect size, and feels real!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Top 5 best purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my BOB XL... I would recommend this purchase to anyone who dabbles in the Martial Arts or who just wants to let off a little steam and get a good workout in... I used water to fill his tank, cause I was impatient and didnt feel like taking the time to pour in the sand (I heard it was a pretty tedious task) but the water works great. It's heavy enough to keep in place and stabilize him but as I have him in my living room I am able to push and pull him around where I see fit without too much trouble @ all :)
customer_reviews.author: Victorious Secret

customer_reviews.title: Century BOB is Great for Training
customer_reviews.text: Always liked Century BOB at the gym so I bought one for my home gym. I used sand to fill the base. That took awhile since the cap and hole is better designed for a water hose. We get really good workouts with BOB and he is excellent for martial arts and self defense training!
customer_reviews.author: JohnD

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We put 250lbs of pool sand in the base and it does pretty well with staying in place. We may need to put a little more in.
customer_reviews.author: Kkat

customer_reviews.title: ... a tool that allowed me to do accuracy work better than can be done with a heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tool that allowed me to do accuracy work better than can be done with a heavy bag. While the bag is great for developing power in striking, it is less than ideal for improving accuracy and speed in compound combatives. BOB fills that need in training when you cannot always rely on a partner. I have worked out with BOB for several weeks now. My accuracy and speed in compound combatives has increased. And unlike partners, he is always ready for a workout. He slides right into his corner when we are done.
customer_reviews.author: M. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Best heavy bag I ever owned. I love the feel, and the fact you need to play the angles. Makes for a much better workout, and very therapeutic. I had a grumpy friend who I don't think I ever see smile come over and backhanded it. He smiled like a little child and went off on it. I love Bob. He's my new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Thunar

customer_reviews.title: ) one of the best striking bag
customer_reviews.text: hands down (or should I say hands up?) one of the best striking bag, particularly for targeted strikes and kicks.
customer_reviews.author: jtinternet

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bob is tough, he stands up to a good beating
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool. Amazing addition to my home training arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Inafective
customer_reviews.text: Hard to move and infective workout as base gets in your way . Inafective for roundhouse practice
customer_reviews.author: Rob Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my garage dojo. Perfect for practicing precision strikes.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I have him mounted on a platform which has rollers so he is easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: Bob works well for practice. I use him in my unarmed defense classes and also to train shooting. Lasers show up well on him. I have him mounted on a platform which has rollers so he is easy to move around, The wheels lock so he does not move unless the wheels are unlocked. Very lifelike.,
customer_reviews.author: open minded listener

customer_reviews.title: Bob is great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he loved it. Arrived in two boxes and the company send a quick response to my email. My husband and son feel this is a great product and the price was fair. I would have used the money for a new handbag but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Lei S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for high intensity cardio
customer_reviews.text: Great for high intensity cardio. Good for both technique and HIT. Personally, I'm sick of having to using leg things for HIT so bob was great. Bob and rowing actually complements each other very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Must buy. If you are looking for one stop here this is it.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW!! This is fantastic. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best around!
customer_reviews.text: A a person whose a heavy hitter, and user of martial arts. I can say this stands the test of time and many beatings. Don't buy a flimsy store bought model. This is your go to for everything. Its worth the wait and saving up for it!
customer_reviews.author: Lokim23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to B.O.B., I now feel that I have all of the tools to properly defend myself - should I be attacked by an angry man with no arms. Furthermore, because I opted for the full torso version, I have been able to perfect my "nut tap" technique. Seriously, Great product. Gives you an actual target instead of just teeing off on a bag. It'll help turn you from a puncher into an actual striker!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Bob is one Tough Cookie.
customer_reviews.text: So far Bob is everything I need. able to take a punch and keep on frowning. using bob for specific target training such as eyes and throat . perfect for that. I have nothing bad to say about it, except maybe he could use a bigger opening on the base to put the sand in.
customer_reviews.author: tracy molter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/fast service.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery! Wish it was the Labor Day price! Great quality. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It slides a little but nothing you can’t adjust to. Remember you’ll need a few bags of sand
customer_reviews.author: coach

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Really helps finetune those essential motor skills ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really helps finetune those essential motor skills when you can aim for an exact physionomic feature instead of just a blank punching bag. KJ Sports shipped it right away and it arrived exactly as advertised in perfect brand new condition. Easy to set up and start using the BOB right away!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bob is awesome!!! I like when you punch him his head moves back. His texture is soft enough to hit bare knuckle. I like being able to target specific spots. Awesome product and it was pretty fast shipping too. I would definitely recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.author: cmil84

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this (I got it as a Christmas gift). It's a stress reliever for him. The only thing that is complicated is emptying out all the sand; we had to do this when moving across the country! Worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: domf

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got this to supplement the heavy bag. Great for target work, and the adjustable height is perfect for myself, or lowering it for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A Comer

customer_reviews.title: If your serious about your training and don't have a steady workout partner Bob's The One!
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely zero complaints about this product and nothing but praise for the excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great original product. Much better than your average bag but definitely over priced!!
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love BOB!!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say... He's there... You punch him... Simple as that... but in all seriousness, he's a great training tool.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Bob is great. He thrives on abuse
customer_reviews.text: Bob is great. He thrives on abuse. The product is exactly as advertised. Bob arrived right on time as promised. I recommend this as a training tool for any fighter new or advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Apple

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I need to change from water to sand, it moves a bit much for me
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: BEST. BOB. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Best. Bob. Ever. Simple as that. Bought this for my son for Christmas and now I want one for myself too. After all my searching, this was definitely the best price too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: taliaferrovaia

customer_reviews.title: ... for exercise and this has turned out to be perfect. I filled it with sand (no water) and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first go at boxing for exercise and this has turned out to be perfect. I filled it with sand (no water) and it takes a lot of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: JpATL

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good for hand and foot training
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good for hand and foot training. As other reviewers state, the head is a little bit flimsy... but it still really helps with targeting. I love how you can adjust the height and pretend the target is taller and shorter than you. Although I am currently unable to use, due to medical reasons, my son is still getting a great workout with BOB! It is really making him better at control and targeting.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Let him have it
customer_reviews.text: My boys love Bob, he can take a beating. I’ve taken the liberty to punch him - Covid is Dragging.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Century Bob XL
customer_reviews.text: Box XL arrived perfectly as advertised. I filled him up with 5 (40lb) bags of sand, using the previously mentioned upside down, bottomless, milk jug method. Slipped on some quality leather, wrist supporting, grappling/boxing gloves and fired away on poor Bob for about 20 heart pounding minutes. What a stress release. Now, most of my workouts include Bob. Great product, shipping, and price. Thank you Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and the recipient loved it. He said that it was of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dish

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun little punching bag and very useful if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little punching bag and very useful if you are taking martial arts. Even if you don't it is a great workout.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.!
customer_reviews.text: Hey it's something I've been wanting for years, now that I'm back in country, it's all mine,hey thanks.!

customer_reviews.title: XL BOB
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Helps with your points of striking. I used play sand and water to make him more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: BOB ! You're Cool !
customer_reviews.text: Shipping on BOB was right on time , Everything described in the product was true, Very satisfied , When I set up BOB, in my opinion I would fill with water than sand unless you don't plan moving it far (Of course unless you use a dolly). Another review on here suggested wearing gloves, Very good advice . A very good product overall !
customer_reviews.author: Vetteman07

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend totally loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as an early Christmas gift and he totally loves it. This make practicing a lot easier than a punching bag. Instead of a wide area to "imagine" as the head, you have a head to work with and can pin point where on the head you would like your punches to land on. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: May Vwj

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy product that I will probably have until I die or stop hitting it. I hit BOB once or twice a week as part of my cardio workout. 4 star because it moves around to much and the water drips out of the cap. Otherwise still a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Bretz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, tough, and quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Great to get anger out on!! Great practice dummy and good sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: TMcK

customer_reviews.title: Good for a workout
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic, kids are throwing it around for WWE practice and having fun with it. Arrived in great condition, but did not include gel gloves that were supposed to be part of the package. Good addition to my workout routine, although it did freak out the dogs for several days as it is realistic looking.
customer_reviews.author: scouting mom

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great unit....came as expected. The surface texture is great for repeated heavy contact. Pulling it out of the box at the office did startled some co-workers...lol
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: BOB is good.
customer_reviews.text: my kids like to climb on BOB as well as targeting their frustrations into BOB instead of each other (some of the time).
customer_reviews.author: john english

customer_reviews.title: BOB is a great tool for general physical fitness and/or self defense training
customer_reviews.text: Century BOB can take a severe beating!!! We filled the base with water and you cannot knock it over. It might slide, depending on the flooring material; but it will not tip over. BOB is a great tool for general physical fitness and/or self defense training. He will take punches and kicks and never be worse for the wear.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to practice my boxing. I don't have a back yard and I didn't want to put a hanging sand bag in the living room. It's pretty fun to hit him and Bob is very durable. Bob is not shaking backward and forward as handbag does. I like what I have. Ye, it's a bit pricey though.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Over all is good , only if they did add bottom surface anti slide ,

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Been kicking his face for a year, holding up great. Face with get discolored tho from transfer of mat dust and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

product_meta.title: Century BOB XL with Base Unit
product_meta.description:
Get realistic training with BOB, the Body Opponent Bag. BOB XL has a longer torso than the original BOB, giving you more striking surface for body shots and kicks. Base fills with water or sand and is rounded for easy relocation.

Have you ever seen a more punchable face? Probably not, since you’ve seen this face get punched, kicked, shot, and stabbed on any number of movies and TV shows. John Wick uses it to home his wetwork and the heroes of the Arrowverse have tested their superpowered might against it. BOB is everywhere.

BOB is resilient and reliable. A training partner that’s always there and can take it on the chin. Literally. A heavy bag will do wonders for your workout, but sometimes you need to know that your cross will land where it needs to. That your uppercut is accurate. That your shots to the ribs hit hard and are well placed.

BOB’s versatility is fully realized as the quintessential freestanding system. Move it around the gym or keep one in the garage. Any environment, BOB’s available. Plus, he’s a good listener.

Features height adjustments from 60 inches to 82 inches tall.
Mannequin - 40" x 15.5" x 10.5" 
Base - 24" Diameter x 19.5" Tall
Approx. 270 lbs. when filled with water

AMAZON.COM
Work the entire upper body with the extra-large Century Body Opponent freestanding heavy bag. Unlike most heavy bags, the Body Opponent looks like an actual person, with a life-like face, shoulders, chest, and stomach. As a result, it's easier than ever to get motivated for your sparring session, with a long torso creating more striking surface for body shot training. The bag is made of high-strength plastisol filled with urethane foam, making it extremely durable over time. It's also stable, with a polyethylene base that fills with approximately 270 pounds of sand or water. Despite the weight, you can still move the bag fairly easily by flipping it to the side and rolling the round base. Equipped with multiple height settings, the Body Opponent bag is ideal for home, apartment, school, or gym use.
feature_bullets: Freestanding heavy bag with life-like upper torso
Creates more striking surface for head or body shot training
High-strength plastisol body filled with urethane foam
Polyethylene base holds up to 270 pounds of water or sand
Rolls easily for transport; multiple height settings
